    • Uses of Chambre in com.filesActions

      Method parameters in com.filesActions with type arguments of type Chambre 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void ReadExternalFiles.dispatchInfoFromFiles(javax.swing.JList patientList, javax.swing.JList examinationList, javax.swing.JList switchRoomAndExaminationList, java.util.ArrayList<Examen> arrayExamination, java.util.ArrayList<Patient> arrayPatient, java.util.ArrayList<Chambre> arrayRoom, javax.swing.JList listOfBookedRoom)
      The only public function of this class lunched in starting application and dispaitching informations from files if files exist
      @see FileControler @see readPatientFile @see readExaminationFile @see readRoomFile() @see RoomFunction#creatRoomIfFileIsEmpty @see areaCode @see mailEndings
      private static void ReadExternalFiles.readRoomFile(java.util.ArrayList<Chambre> arrayRoom, java.util.ArrayList<Examen> arrayExamination, javax.swing.JList listOfBookedRoom, javax.swing.JList switchRoomAndExaminationList)
      This function extract Chambre from csv file and add it to ArrayList<Chambre>arrayRoom or RoomFunction.bookedRoomList
      Each rows are extracted from the file, stocked in a String [] splitRoom and split Then each index of the array are stored in variables and parsed if needed The examination for which a room has been booked is extracted from arrayExamination those variables are used in Chambre constructor.
      static void WriteInExternalFiles.writeRoomFile(java.util.ArrayList<Chambre> arrayRoom)
      This function is used for saving Chambres' informations
      Each Chambre stored in arrayRoom is extracted thanks to a loop The Chambre's informations are saved in Chambre.txt that is created at the project's root For saving those informations a toString function is override in Chambre class The finally block is used to certify that the buffer has weel been closed before quitting the function
      Chambre.save is only used in writing and reading Object and allow the application to switch beetween toString options this param doesn't have Getter and Setter functions to reduce all wrong using

      ArrayList<Chambre> temporaryListRoom stores Chambre object after filters have been used

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private static Chambre RoomFunction.extractRoomFromArray(javax.swing.JList list)
      this function is used to extract a Chambre from temporaryListRoom
      If the result of the selected index equals -1 the function isn't executed The Chambre is extracted from the temporaryListRoom
      Methods in com.functions with parameters of type Chambre

      private static void RoomFunction.bookingRoom(Examen examination, Chambre room, com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser entryDateField, com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser releaseDateField)
      this function is used to update the information of a Chambre and Examen object
      This function can only be used through updateRoomInformation The values writen by the user are registered in the specific Chambre Object The values of the Examen object related to this booking are updated
      private static void RoomFunction.defaultDataLongStayAlone(Chambre room)
      This function is used to reset to default the values of a specific Chambre object
      This function can only be used through resetRoomDataToDefault

      private static void RoomFunction.noBookingRoom(javax.swing.JList list, Examen examination, Chambre room)
      this function is used to update the information of a Chambre and Examen object
      This function can only be used through updateRoomInformation The Parameter bookingRoom of the specific Examen is updated A Chambre object is instantiate with specific values The Examen update its Chambre parameter Object with those new informations
      static void RoomFunction.printRoomInList(javax.swing.JList list, Chambre room)
      this function is used to remove the booked Chambre from bookedRoomList
      A loop is used to check all the Chambre Object stored in arrayRoom When the specific Chambre object is found, it is removed from the bookedRoomList Finally the bookedRoomList updated is shown through the JList
      static void RoomFunction.resetRoomDataToDefault(Chambre room)
      This function is used to reset to default the values of a specific Chambre object
      One of the following funtions is used if it matches the parameters of the Chambre object
      private static void RoomFunction.updateRoomInformation(javax.swing.JList list, Examen examination, Chambre room, com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser entryDateField, com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser releaseDateField, javax.swing.JRadioButton withoutRoomRButton)
      this function is used to update the information of a Chambre object
      The function used is related to the state of the withoutRoomRButton if the withoutRoomRButton is selected noBookingRoom() is put in action else bookingRoom() is used
      Method parameters in com.functions with type arguments of type Chambre 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void RoomFunction.bookingAvailableRoom(javax.swing.JList list, com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser entryDateField, com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser releaseDateField, javax.swing.JRadioButton withoutRoomRButton, java.util.ArrayList<Examen> arrayExamination, javax.swing.JTextField patientNumberBookingRoomPanelField, javax.swing.JRadioButton withRoomRButton, javax.swing.ButtonGroup accompanyingGroup, javax.swing.JComboBox LengthOfStaySelectionBox, javax.swing.JTextField bedRoomNumberField, java.util.ArrayList<Chambre> arrayRoom, javax.swing.JList bookedRoomList, javax.swing.ButtonGroup bookingGroup, javax.swing.JRadioButton withAccompangyingRButton, javax.swing.JRadioButton withoutAccompangyingRButton)
      this function is used to instantiate a Chambre Object from the choices of the user
      First The extractExaminationFromList is used and an Examen is created If withoutRoomRButton is not selected, the extractRoomFromArray is used and a Chambre is identified Then all the field are checked Several functions are used to update the several List and Array before updating the values of the selected Chambre and Examen temporaryListRoom must be cleared before quitting the function
      static void RoomFunction.creatRoomIfFileIsEmpty(java.util.ArrayList<Chambre> arrayRoom)
      This function is needed when the Application is started for the first time It creates Chambre objects whose are stored in arrayRoom Then those Chambre Objects are saved in a txt file
      static void DefaultValueLuncher.defaultValuesStartSoftware(com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser birthdateField, javax.swing.JList patientList, javax.swing.JList examinationList, javax.swing.JList switchRoomAndExaminationList, java.util.ArrayList<Examen> arrayExamination, java.util.ArrayList<Patient> arrayPatient, java.util.ArrayList<Chambre> arrayRoom, com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser examinationDateField, javax.swing.JList listOfBookedRoom)
      this function is used to dispatch informations extracted from files and to set to default the Date field
      static void RoomFunction.deleteBookedRoom(javax.swing.JList switchRoomAndExaminationList, javax.swing.JList bookedList, java.util.ArrayList<Examen> arrayExamination, java.util.ArrayList<Chambre> arrayRoom)
      this function is used to delete the booking of a Chambre Object
      If the result of the selected index equals -1 the function isn't executed Else a Chambre Object is instantiate with the informations stores in the bookedRoomList at the specific index Several functions are used to reset all the informations related to the Examen and the Chambre objects
      private static void RoomFunction.filterRoomWithSelection(javax.swing.JList list, java.util.ArrayList<Chambre> arrayRoom, javax.swing.JComboBox LengthOfStaySelectionBox, javax.swing.JRadioButton withAccompangyingRButton, javax.swing.JRadioButton withoutAccompanyingRButton)
      this function is used to filter the available Chambre object with the informations selected by the user
      The function used is related to the state of the withAccompangyingRButton and LengthOfStaySelectionBox If withAccompangyingRButton and the first index of LengthOfStaySelectionBox are selected selectRoomShorStaytAccompanying() is put in action Else if withAccompangyingRButton and the Second index of LengthOfStaySelectionBox are selected selectRoomLongStaytAccompanying() is put in action Else if withoutAccompanyingRButton and the first index of LengthOfStaySelectionBox are selected selectRoomShorStayAlone() is put in action Else if withoutAccompanyingRButton and the Second index of LengthOfStaySelectionBox are selected selectRoomLongStayAlone() is put in action
      private static void RoomFunction.printRoomInList(javax.swing.JList list, java.util.ArrayList<Chambre> arrayRoom)
      this function is used to show only the booked Chambre information in the specific JList
      At the beginning of this function the bookedRoomList must be cleared A loop is used to check all the Chambre Object stored in arrayRoom If the parameter examination of the Chambre is not null The Chambre is store in bookedRoomList Finally the Chambre stored in bookedRoomList are shown through the JList
      private static void RoomFunction.selectRoomLongStayAlone(javax.swing.JList list, java.util.ArrayList<Chambre> arrayRoom)
      this function is used to reduce the number of available Chambre with the choices of the user
      This function can only be used through filterRoomWithSelection() TemporaryListRoom must be cleared at the beginning of this function In a loop all the available Chambre objects are checked All Chambre Object matching the choices of the user are add to TemporaryListRoom Then they are shown through the JList
      private static void RoomFunction.selectRoomLongStaytAccompanying(javax.swing.JList list, java.util.ArrayList<Chambre> arrayRoom)
      this function is used to reduce the number of available Chambre with the choices of the user
      This function can only be used through filterRoomWithSelection() TemporaryListRoom must be cleared at the beginning of this function In a loop all the available Chambre objects are checked All Chambre Object matching the choices of the user are add to TemporaryListRoom Then they are shown through the JList
      private static void RoomFunction.selectRoomShorStayAlone(javax.swing.JList list, java.util.ArrayList<Chambre> arrayRoom)
      this function is used to reduce the number of available Chambre with the choices of the user
      This function can only be used through filterRoomWithSelection() TemporaryListRoom must be cleared at the beginning of this function In a loop all the available Chambre objects are checked All Chambre Object matching the choices of the user are add to TemporaryListRoom Then they are shown through the JList
      private static void RoomFunction.selectRoomShorStaytAccompanying(javax.swing.JList list, java.util.ArrayList<Chambre> arrayRoom)
      this function is used to reduce the number of available Chambre with the choices of the user
      This function can only be used through filterRoomWithSelection() TemporaryListRoom must be cleared at the beginning of this function In a loop all the available Chambre objects are checked All Chambre Object matching the choices of the user are add to TemporaryListRoom Then they are shown through the JList
      private static void RoomFunction.showInformationFromTemporaryListRoom(javax.swing.JList list, javax.swing.JTextField bedRoomNumberField, java.util.ArrayList<Chambre> arrayRoom)
      this function is used to dispatch the information of a Chambre object in the related fields
      This function can only be used through showInformationRoomAndExamination() If the result of the selected index equals -1 the function isn't executed Then if temporaryListRoom is empty the Chambre is extracted from the arrayRoom and the room number is displayed in the specific field Else the Chambre is extracted from the temporaryListRoom and the room number is displayed in the specific field
      static void RoomFunction.showInformationRoomAndExamination(javax.swing.JList list, java.util.ArrayList<Chambre> arrayRoom, java.util.ArrayList<Examen> arrayExamination, javax.swing.JTextField patientNumberBookingRoomPanelField, javax.swing.JTextField bedRoomNumberField)
      this function is used to dispatch the information of a Chambre object in the related fields
      The function used is related to the state of the temporaryListRoom if the temporaryListRoom is empty showInformationFromArrayExamination() if put in action else showInformationFromTemporaryListRoom() is used
      static void RoomFunction.updateListOfAvailableRoom(javax.swing.JList list, java.util.ArrayList<Chambre> arrayRoom, javax.swing.JTextField patientNumberBookingRoomPanelField, javax.swing.JRadioButton withRoomRButton, javax.swing.JRadioButton withoutRoomRButton, javax.swing.JRadioButton withAccompangyingRButton, javax.swing.JRadioButton withoutAccompangyingRButton, javax.swing.JComboBox LengthOfStaySelectionBox, com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser entryDateField, com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser releaseDateField)
      this function is used to select the Chambre Object available from the choices of the user
      before the selection of the Chambre is done all the field are check If the result of the selected index equals -1 the isn't executed If withoutRoomRButton is selected, the Examination is updated and the function ends Else the other fields are checked , the Examination is updated The default range for the entry and realese date are updated Finally filterRoomWithSelection() is used
